# Install BWA

```{r}
wget https://kent.dl.sourceforge.net/project/bio-bwa/bwa-0.7.17.tar.bz2
tar jxf bwa-0.7.17.tar.bz2
cd bwa-0.7.17
make

export PATH=/homes/wells/data-on-saxony/single-cell/sequencing/software/bwa-0.7.17/:$PATH

# download reference genome
cd metadata

```
